review.reviewBody:
The portions are decent. The 112. Beef and Broccoli Chow Mein / 白加利牛肉炒麵 was very flavourful. 
TheHoney Garlic Diced Tender Beef with Walnuts / 蒜子蜜汁琥珀牛柳丁 was pretty tasty too but meat was slightly tough. 
That's why I'm only giving them 4 stars.
I thought it would be whole duck but it was small. Still tasty though
